name: Spellbook (KingBen, zzzergling, codypfrunder, davidlh123, dnajerab, RydalisDarx, Poorgrammer, Niikonnen, k10c)
name_original: Spellbook (KingBen, zzzergling, codypfrunder, davidlh123, dnajerab, RydalisDarx, Poorgrammer, Niikonnen, k10c)
description:
Spellbook is a bullet-hell boss-rush game in which you cast spells and dodge attacks all using your keyboard. Both of these mechanics revolve around pressing certain keys or typing certain words. Test your typing speed and reflexes in this fast-paced, action-heavy take on a typing game.

Controls
Control your character by pressing keys on the keyboard.
Cast spells by typing certain words while holding shift.
Dodge the boss' attacks, and fight them with a variety of attacks.
Play though all 4 stages to win.

Credits
Team Lead - Benjamin Wargowski
Producer - Diego Najera
Head Programmer - Thomas Tran
Programmers - Ali Hassan, Samuel Hultman, David Huynh
Artist - Edem Sedor, Cody Pfrunder
Audio Designer - Nicholas Lins
Game Design - Katen Chin
UI / UX - Elijah Tabachnik
